lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: We can change lives through our small acts
lender.occupational_info: I help people know how to do their jobs without hurting themselves or the people around them.

lender.name: Katy
lender.loan_because: Opportunity is the greatest gift to give.
lender.occupational_info: i help communities plan and develop strategies to help low-income people.

lender.name: martine
lender.loan_because: i want those poor people to have a better life...
lender.occupational_info: hard but we have also a lot of possibilitees to make it better

lender.name: Kyari
lender.loan_because: "Seva Paramo Dharma/" (Sanskrit) To serve is the most important duty.
lender.occupational_info: Serve the place which has given you everything, a house to live, school to study, food to eat, friends to be and memories to cherish.

lender.name: jean
lender.loan_because: I wanted to set-up an outlet to support the scholarship of the Daraghuyan Tribe youth (indegenous people) based in Bukidnon, Philippines http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=0Hur0I1hh1I. I will give them free franchise but we need to raise funds to set-up their outlets. The profit that they will make from the operation will sustain part of the schooling expenses of the youth. Please visit our website www.soupoftheday.weebly.com and see the blog section about the fund raising activity for the lumads.
lender.occupational_info: I am an entrepreneur who wanted to do business to sustain my goal to help others through job creation and creating business opportunities. A talent I can share with others, wasted if can't be achieved. Our business is more on nutritious food abundance awareness. We aim to empower people through knowing and by knowing to create livelihood. We concentrate on the power of herbs, a movement in action.

lender.name: Hassan
lender.loan_because: a small contribution can make a big change in a person live
lender.occupational_info: I am a partner of a audit firm in Maldives

lender.name: Valency
lender.loan_because: I believe little acts make big differences.
lender.occupational_info: I'm raising 4 children. I read and sew when I have the time.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: Because when I started my business all the banks turned me down and I received my start by helpful business people giving me a chance to succeed. Now 12 years later I own 3 different companies all doing very well.
lender.occupational_info: I own a company that designs websites for small and medium sized businesses. I also own a promotional marketing distribution company.

lender.name: abbie
lender.loan_because: I visited Vietnam last year and was affected deeply by what I experienced. We simply have to help people who want to improve their lives and are willing to work hard but just don't have the resources that we have access to here in the US.
lender.occupational_info: I have two young boys and also run my own business. I work in advertising and marketing and love what I do.

lender.name: Mohammed
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in peoples' lives. I believe that supporting people to achieve their dreams through their own effeorts is more rewarding and sustainable than giving them handouts.
lender.occupational_info: I am a banker with a special interest in social entrepreneurship.

lender.name: Bryce
lender.loan_because: To extend opportunity to those that otherwise may not have access to it.

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with everything I need and want to help others.
lender.occupational_info: My husband and I run a ship chandlery business delivering deck & engine supply to ships.

lender.name: Better Life Bags
lender.loan_because:
I want to make lives better one purse at a time. :)
I believe that a better world is possible and I want to begin by doing my part to alleviate poverty.
"So whatever you wish that others would do to you do also to them for this is the law and the prophets." -Jesus
"Be the change you want to see in the world." -Gandhi
lender.occupational_info: I make customizable bags from my home and give 10% of every transaction to an entrepreneur on the other side of the world. Every customer receives a picture of the person their bag went to help

lender.name: Becca
lender.loan_because: no one should feel forgotten.

lender.name: Aghar Prem
lender.loan_because: because this simply act can make someone's life a little bit easier.

lender.name: Mario
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: Kara
lender.loan_because: I want to give others the opportunity to sustain a better quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales rep.

lender.name: Nikos & Linda
lender.loan_because: we believe in positive change and we love how technology enables us to connect directly to a human being somewhere on this Earth that we can help.
lender.occupational_info: As restauranteurs, we serve lovely Greek food in an atmosphere of beauty, and hope to be a catalyst for living well. As writers and filmmakers, we explore what connects us all through books, stories and films. As an educator, we work with schools to promote curriculum that matters, especially that which connects students to life around the world.

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I can, and want to share what I have. And hopefully those whom I help, through their efforts, will help others.
lender.occupational_info: I'm just getting my own consulting business off the ground, sharing my experience and knowledge with companies and organizations who need corporate communication support and services. From developing strategic communication plans to executing media relations campaigns ... from providing onsite communication and PR support to writing press releases and collateral ... I do what I can to make my clients look good and to make sure they can tell their stories in the best ways possible.

lender.name: Joyce
lender.loan_because: In a very small way, I hope I can make a difference to someone else's life.

lender.name: Mike & Amy
lender.loan_because: We've been blessed with many great opportunities and a wonderful family, hopefully we can share some of our blessings with other people.

lender.name: Suzanna & Richard
lender.loan_because: Microloaning allows us to get involved on a more personal and direct level. We admire people's entrepreneurial spirit the world over, and want to support that to the best of our ability.
lender.occupational_info: Suzanna works as a freelance graphic designer and travel photographer. Richard is an industrial electrician.

lender.name: Amanda
lender.loan_because: I think this is an AMAZING cause! I really like the idea that women in impoverished communities across the world can change their lot in life with just my $25 loan. I think this is a fantastic way to make a difference in the world. :)
lender.occupational_info: I work at a retail store while going to school. I am starting my master's degree in the fall. I've already gone to college and recieved a bachelor's degree in Anthropology, the study of people and their cultures. I think that I would like to work for a non-profit organization that makes a difference in the world.

lender.name: Rick and Carly Hansen
lender.loan_because: It feels good.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone who is able needs to help out those less fortunate in the world. It is very fulfilling to aid others make their lives better.
lender.occupational_info: The bus service is for people with physical disabilities and the elderly that cannot use conventional transit, so we provide a door to door service.

lender.name: Robert & Victoria
lender.loan_because: We want to make a difference in someone elses lives!
lender.occupational_info: We take steel, metal, and with the help of machines make it in to something someone can use or wants.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: I want to help people build sustainable businesses that change their lives
lender.occupational_info: real estate- I sell homes

lender.name: Theo
lender.loan_because:
My work involves helping businesses here in Australia raise money through equity funding; selling part of their business in exchange for funds. Typically customers feel they need hundreds of thousands of dollars to start a business and to make a difference in their lives.
I love the fact that through Kiva, such small amounts of money can really make a difference to a whole family and community ... so I'm in!
lender.occupational_info: I help people raise money they need for their business by selling part of their business.

lender.name: Brendan
lender.loan_because: I care about the world!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to do so - I consider it an honor to help others become more independent and self-sustaining. I believe that the place to invest our money when trying to help poverty is into the hands of people who are committed to working hard to help themselves, not just waiting for a handout.

lender.name: Jed
lender.loan_because: I am a small biz owner and that is where my heart is, with the little guy all over the world.
lender.occupational_info: I make T-Shirts, Posters, and Design Paper Goods.

lender.name: Mary, Jay and Ian
lender.loan_because: We are fortunate to be able to. And we love the inspiring stories.
lender.occupational_info: We are artists, musicians and humanitarians who care a great deal about humanity and our planet, our one and only home.

lender.name: Cheryl
lender.loan_because: Money is only meaningful in that it represents human intent.

lender.name: Bonnie&Emily
lender.loan_because: we enjoy helping others.
lender.occupational_info: Hand-stitched custom-fit all leather footwear

lender.name: Christopher
lender.loan_because: Small thriving businesses will mean peace and prosperity. If these small firms are nurtured, it will mean a better quality of life for everyone in the region.
lender.occupational_info: We manage private equity, develop commerical real estate, and produce energy efficient building materials.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: I think we should help those who are less fortunate than ourselves

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I love supporting entrepreneurs! As global citizens we will all prosper by contributing to the entrepreneurial success of those in developing nations.

lender.name: Mark & Adela
lender.loan_because: My wife is from Ecuador and we know how hard it is for people in other countries to gain access to credit in order to start a business. And because we believe in Karmic Money Laundering!
lender.occupational_info: I manage the investments of a foundation that supports equal opportunity education and Adela is a student studying bio-chemistry

lender.name: Debra
lender.loan_because: I think kiva.org embodies the "hand up, rather than a hand out" mentality that I appreciate. I am very fortunate and want to help others to experience success in their own ways.
lender.occupational_info: I teach 5 and 6-year old children in a public school.

lender.name: Ian
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: Teaching

lender.name: Danica
lender.loan_because: I want to help people become self sufficient and elevate them out of poverty. We take so much for granted. I want to help someone else who wants to help themselves, but is having difficulty accessing the resources to do it.
lender.occupational_info: Doctor in emergency medicine

lender.name: Lauren
lender.loan_because: Trying to reset the balance of opportunity for others who have every reason to be successful in their lives. This is especially true for women and girls who remain the single most endangered "species" on earth.
lender.occupational_info: I have dedicated my life to helping other folks. I work for NGO type organizations within my community locally, nationally and internationally. We are very successful in many ways. Yet, I want to help my neighbor directly, whether it is across the world or not. I am a single women, have never been married. I take my life's joy in making significant relationships with other people. Thank you for making this very personal and simple.

lender.name: TEEN
lender.loan_because: StumbledUpon'd Kiva. The very next day I read Deuternomy 15 in the Bible which talks about lending to the needy. Jesus promotes even making loans when there isn't much chance of getting your money back. I think God smiles when He thinks of what's going on via Kiva.

lender.name: NDSL
lender.loan_because: This is not the driod you are looking for...
lender.occupational_info: Beeping alllllllllll the way

lender.name: kairi
lender.loan_because: Microfinace will change this world into a better place.

lender.name: Nolio
lender.loan_because: I'd like to contribute to a more balanced globe.
lender.occupational_info: Besides writing computer software, I am also a musician.

lender.name: Valerie Corey
lender.loan_because: I am so appreciative of my many blessings and I truly believe we can make the biggest difference by empowering others to help themselves... it's a win/win. Kiva has made this possible in the simplest, most wonderful way. They are angels.
lender.occupational_info: One by one, I work with people via vibrational healing methods (Reiki, EFT, Flower Essences) who wish to connect with their wholeness, oneness and wellness... the WOW within so they may truly recognize their uniqueness. I am a bridge to the light. within.

lender.name: Aldina
lender.loan_because: I want to help people who want to work for a better life
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers

lender.name: Dolphin Centre
lender.loan_because: we love to help people help themselves
lender.occupational_info: Natural Therapy Centre

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I feel that it is important to give to others in need whenever possible.
lender.occupational_info: I work in the Dept. of Psychiatry at a major medical school in St. Louis

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: sometimes my idealism overwhelms my cynicism.

lender.name: stacy
lender.loan_because: The people on kiva are inspiring.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I like to see everyone have a home and food and a quality life. I am blessed to have all this.
lender.occupational_info: I am now retired-no longer working at a day to day job, but worked as a nurse helping deliver babies and then as a psychologist--someone who helps people to improve their lives by dealing with the problems in their lives.

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I teacher English to High School students at a Charter school.

lender.name: Judith
Natalie
lender.loan_because: I think women across the world can improve their economic status and start to achieve economic independence with microlending programs such as Kiva.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a U.S. Senate campaign.

lender.name: Veriria
lender.loan_because: Because these people have the drive to start up their own businesses and are not afraid to ask for help.
lender.occupational_info: I work onboard Amtrak trains selling food in the cafe car.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: even a small amount of money to you or i can make such a difference if it's dstributed properly, by the right organization...

lender.name: forMandM
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate enough to be able to.
lender.occupational_info: I am a scientist. The most interesting thing I have ever done is to work on the development of a machine that can do brain surgery with x-rays.

lender.name: Trunk Bound Regime
lender.loan_because: We loan because we are two artists who really care about the welfare of other people. We also want to encourage other musicians like ourselves to get involved in Kiva!

lender.name: Rebecca
lender.loan_because: I feel that people like me who live in relative ease & plenty have a responsibility to give back to others in the world who are struggling.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a small farm museum, taking care of livestock & crops. I also educate visitors about the way farming was done in my country in the 17th century.

lender.name: Linda Beck Kuban
lender.loan_because: It feels good. Lending validates our connectiveness to others.

lender.name: Krista
lender.loan_because: I'm trying to walk the walk.
lender.occupational_info: Parent, writer, world citizen.

lender.name: emma
lender.loan_because: My daddy thought I should help other people with some of the money I saved.
lender.occupational_info: When I am not at home with mommy, I go to kindergarden.

lender.name: Viva
lender.loan_because: I want to make a positive difference in the world!

lender.name: Sheri
lender.occupational_info: I work in a library, loaning people books, and have a small sewing business I run out of my home.

lender.name: Abbriell
lender.loan_because: I admire people who work hard to make life better for themselves and their families.

lender.name: Connie Owens
lender.loan_because: It is one of the many ways I can help others in far away homes. It is a convenient way for me to be of assist to those who are working as hard as I am at making a living for them and their families. Together we can!
lender.occupational_info: I am a guide for those who seek a spiritual path in order to improve their lives, recovery from addictions, and trauma. By developing a spiritual life the rest of life becomes a bit easier, though it does not eliminate the challenges. I am a teacher, guide and mentor to those who are seeking to change their lives.

lender.name: Nicolas
lender.loan_because: I want to make a difference in people's lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses reduce their consumption of electricity and gas. I like my work because I get to go in the field a lot, and I have a positive impact for my clients and for the environment.

lender.name: Familia
lender.loan_because: I actually believe we are all in this together.
lender.occupational_info: I try to make people buy things by using my creativity.

lender.name: Ria
lender.loan_because: I know what it is to be without and have no one to turn to This is a way of giving back a little for being so very bless....
lender.occupational_info: I work with kids and to me it is very rewarding to work with children that is so innocent to the way of the world

lender.name: Ivica & Sonja
lender.loan_because: We want to help people.

lender.name: Min
lender.loan_because: I believe in the transformative power of microcredit for lifting people out of the cycle of poverty.

lender.name: Ryan
lender.loan_because: Everyone deserves the oppertunity to be successful.

lender.name: Debbie
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference in someone's life a little at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am the manager of a clinic that helps find cures and treatments for diseases.

lender.name: Leo
lender.loan_because: Somebody very special gave me as a present a gift certificate and I think it's a wonderful thing. I am figuring out how the site works and evaluating who to loan to.

lender.name: Sebastian
lender.loan_because: I can!

lender.name: Samantha
lender.loan_because: It is important to help out others who work hard.
lender.occupational_info: I work for a non profit biotech company that researches ALS, Lou Gehrigs disease.

lender.name: Clara
lender.loan_because: "You must be the change you want to see in the world" --Ghandi

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: I want to lend a hand where I can. It is just a way to do something very personal to help.
lender.occupational_info: I help big companies understand their customers. I help they by interviewing customers and uncovering new opportunities.

lender.name: Jonathan & Kari
lender.loan_because: I'm impressed by the strength and perseverance of these entrepreneurs.

lender.name: Alissa
lender.loan_because: I want to start finding new ways to share the prosperity I enjoy with others. This is a way to find people who are motivated and entreprenurial, but who are not surrounded by opportunity as we are.
lender.occupational_info: I am an architect and designer of places where informal, intergenerational, and self-directed learning is fostered.

lender.name: Luis Ventura
lender.loan_because:
The question should be why not?
Why not?, help another human being forge a better future.
A portion of the money I lend comes from the ad revenue generated by my website Linhost.info.
lender.occupational_info: At the moment I am in college with focus on Information Technology(IT).

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because: I care about others not just in my community but around the world.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I want to help others that are in need
lender.occupational_info: im just a student that wants to help others

lender.name: Adrienne
lender.loan_because: I want to help women start their own businesses.

lender.name: susan
lender.loan_because: I am a widow with a disabled child - in another country that would make my life extremely difficult. I have the good fortune to live in an affluent country. I loan because I can.
lender.occupational_info: I am carer for my disabled son. I also keep dairy goats and teach quiltmaking

lender.name: Luca B.
lender.loan_because: Microfinance is a wonderful and effective strategy to make people help themselves and share their projects with lenders. I feel better when I loan .
lender.occupational_info: I am a free lance consultant. I define organisational processes, analyse team performance and train people to manage their projects more efficiently.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: I loan because I can.

lender.name: Bianca
lender.loan_because: I think it is important for all women to be independent and self-sufficient

lender.name: Mary E
lender.loan_because: I am fortunate to have seen the impact of a loan on a family's future and well being.

lender.name: Poppy
lender.loan_because: it is a small way that I can help people in other parts of the world.
lender.occupational_info: I stay at home and take care of my two young children.

lender.name: Erin and Aaron
lender.loan_because: My wife and I want to make an impact in the world and what better way than to provide loans that will help a community be self sustainable. "Teach a man to fish and he will be able to feed his family for the rest of his life."
lender.occupational_info: A business man is the best way to describe what I do. I help buy and sell companies for my clients. My wife is a surgical nurse.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because:
I can
In may 2008 I received a check for $400 for some work I had completed. I decided to invest half the check into Loans.
email me for more info: Peterseltzer @ Gmail.com
lender.occupational_info: University Student

lender.name: Richalle
lender.loan_because: I do not want to take anything for granted.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer.

lender.name: Bob
lender.loan_because: I hope in some small way I can help a person out there, even if it is just a little bit, to make his and his family a little bit better.
lender.occupational_info: I work on Jet engines that help airplanes fly.

lender.name: Jynell
lender.loan_because: everyone needs someone to believe in them.
lender.occupational_info: I am a nurse. I care for children on ventilators. I also work for a medical equipment company and deal with all things respiratory.

lender.name: Victoria
lender.loan_because:
it is in my heart to help anyone I can in any way that I can. It should be in everybody's heart to help one another LIVE!
FAITH - HOPE -LOVE

lender.name: Emma
lender.occupation: Student in Mr. Gallagher\'s kindergarten class

lender.name: Shannon
lender.loan_because: The business owners are inspiring to me.
lender.occupational_info: I am going to school to become a medical doctor. Right now I am doing rotations, or on the job training. In one year I will be done. I love medicine because it allows me to help people from all walks of life, young and old. In medicine you are able to provide a very unique service to people that they really appreciate. It's very rewarding.

lender.name: Bronwyn
lender.loan_because: even the smallest loan can combine with other loans and better an entire community.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I have worked with small business owners my whole career, and I know how hard they work.
lender.occupational_info: I provide franchise support to small business owners.

lender.name: Jordan
lender.loan_because: I loan because I think random acts of kindness can change the world, and I want to help. I want to help people achieve their dreams.
lender.occupational_info: I am an engineer.

lender.name: Beebers119
lender.loan_because: As a practicing Buddhist, I try to make as many good causes as I can. Loans to Kiva seem to be wonderful causes.
lender.occupational_info: I give legal advice to people and companies.

lender.name: Nessie
lender.loan_because: Its win-win
lender.occupational_info: I try to figure out how to kill viruses

lender.name: Brian
lender.loan_because: I know how lucky I am to have been born in the First World. The more we help out our fellow man, the more we will all benefit. And I'd want someone to do it for me, were I in their shoes.
lender.occupational_info: I write software for managing the benefits of retired soldiers.

lender.name: Erin
lender.loan_because: I'm blessed.

lender.name: Craig
lender.loan_because: I want to help people help themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I help make animated movies like Over The Hedge.

lender.name: Kate
lender.loan_because: Small changes can make big differences.

lender.name: Mario
lender.loan_because: I cherish the dreams and ambitions of others.
lender.occupational_info: I am an actor!

lender.name: Leanne
lender.loan_because: I have a wonderful healthy family.

lender.name: KAREN B.
lender.loan_because: I am especially interested in helping people in Vietnam because my mother is from Saigon. It makes my heart happy knowing that I can help make a difference in peoples lives!
lender.occupational_info: I sell medications that help people live healthier & happier lives.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I admire the industrious. It also feels good.

lender.name: Julie
lender.loan_because: It feels right. We all need extra help sometimes. I had a friend loan me money for a computer. I would not be in business without it. Life is circular.
lender.occupational_info: I make stationery - wedding invitations, announcements, calling cards and thank you cards. I'm obsessed with paper.

lender.name: Claire
lender.loan_because: I want to help make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I teach young people to understand the beliefs of others.

lender.name: hari
lender.loan_because: willing to help

lender.name: Neil
lender.loan_because: I want to make the world a better place. Everyone on Earth is related to each other.
lender.occupational_info: I sell fabric to garment manufacturers

lender.name: Mark
lender.occupation: Multi Functional Copiers, printers, and fax
lender.loan_because: As a business man myself, I understand the value of being a helping hand. Faith in human nature is restored everytime my loans are repaid. And it fascinating to loan to far away places.
lender.occupational_info: Just like many of the people that Kiva helps, hardworking, family man, just trying to make it, and be successful and make a place in the world.

lender.name: Neal
lender.loan_because: I can like my dad
lender.occupational_info: Educational

lender.name: Kay
lender.loan_because: it's a pleasure to help others to improve the lives of their families and themselves.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a wife, mother, x-teacher, and now a Grandmother.

lender.name: Kelli
lender.loan_because: it makes a difference!
lender.occupational_info: I introduce people to the world on the mv Explorer through the Institute for Shipboard Education, Enrichment Voyages

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: I can and I should.
lender.occupational_info: I hang lights for special events, theater and parties.

lender.name: Corrie
lender.loan_because: one random act of kindness CAN change the world!
lender.occupational_info: Life is enjoyed when you begin to live each day loving yourself and sharing that love with others.

lender.name: Michael
lender.occupational_info: It's cool, it's fun, it makes a difference

lender.name: yusher
lender.loan_because: i need to have this loan because i am a forex trader and i need to have some capital to start trading .
lender.occupational_info: well my work is very lucrative but it needed a lots of experience you have to be very well informed befor you jump into it .

lender.name: Matt
lender.loan_because: I can
lender.occupational_info: improving manufacturing processes

lender.name: Al N.
lender.loan_because: Promoting entrepreneurship through grassroots efforts is one of the best ways to achieve meaningful development. These people have great ambitions and ideas, they just need some modest capital!
lender.occupational_info: Distributing government subsidies to people with low incomes for heating fuel and electricity (LIHEAP).

lender.name: Karen
lender.loan_because: To help promote various ways of improving determinants of health.

lender.name: e.
lender.loan_because: .. many have even less than me to share ..

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: There's a need and I'm able to help.

lender.name: Caroline
lender.loan_because: I'm fortunate enough to live in a place where I have incredible opportunities and lack for nothing.

lender.name: Chris
lender.loan_because: someone who i admire greatly gave me a gift certificate. now i find that giving to someone who truly appreciates and needs it just makes me feel really good!
lender.occupational_info: I am a carpenter. I build everything from cabinets and furniture to houses. I also work with steel and many other types of media. i work with my hands and i feel good when i finish a project. my goals in life are to be successful enough to pass on my knowledge of life to who ever needs it or wants it.

lender.name: Nancy
lender.loan_because: I love to help people!!

lender.name: Yuiki
lender.loan_because: I live in Kyoto, Japan. I am a sophomore at Kyoto University of Foreign Studies. I am studying English, Arabic and Swahili. I belong to a group holding charity events and doing Model United Nations. I really hope that every person lives in peace, happiness and good health.

lender.name: YUKI
lender.loan_because: I am excited to have the opportunity to help business to get better life.

lender.name: Hiroshi
lender.loan_because: Every day is the turning point.

lender.name: Tetsuro
lender.occupation: The officer of the publishing company
lender.loan_because: It has been supported in one's youth by various people. I think that it is the turn that oneself supports from now on.

lender.name: YOSUKE [tony]
lender.loan_because: JUST want to....One for ALL-All for ONE!! I feel so good about this N really hope that my little loan can help a big difference.
lender.occupational_info: paint dep.

lender.name: Yoshiaki
lender.loan_because: This is a good way to be able to help people around the world. It's more personal than supporting a large organization and not really knowing where your money goes. It's a really cool idea and also fun!

lender.name: Dan
lender.loan_because: I care about the welfare of my fellow human beings, and see lending as a small yet effective way to help fight poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in school, preparing to attend college in a year. After college I will be trained as an officer in the United States Army.

lender.name: Nari
lender.loan_because: I wanna support you.
lender.occupational_info: Grapical User Interface Designer, Electrical Maker of Japan.

lender.name: Takayuki
lender.occupation: Technical adviser for digital photo studio
lender.loan_because: I hope for the thing that a moving photograph is taken all over the world.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: Kiva loans work.
lender.occupational_info: I help scientists and engineers obtain and manage the information they need to do their work.

lender.name: Rob
lender.loan_because: it takes balls to start a business

lender.name: Ricardo
lender.loan_because: I believe lending money to people so they can improve their business is a great way to help them to start moving towards a better life.

lender.name: Akio
lender.loan_because: This micro finance can show one of possibilities. I hope my support helps someone's future.
lender.occupational_info: Science

lender.name: Kelly
lender.loan_because: My sister worked on a family owned coffee plantation in central Nicaragua and learned first hand what a huge difference micro-finance can have on rural communities. We loan in her memory.

lender.name: Frances
lender.loan_because: I respect and honor those who want to help themselves to improve the quality of their lives. I was raised on a farm and as a child it was required to work in the fields, which resulted in a strong personal work ethnic. "Life is not easy" Now I would like to give someone and opportunity to enhance their day to day life.
lender.occupational_info: Currently I am retired. As a child I was raised on a farm, my siblings and I were required to work in the fields. I was fortunate to receive a scholarship to nursing school. I worked as a surgical nurse, married, and was a stay at home mom for three wonderful children. When my husband was diagnosed with cancer I returned to the nursing profession. I am passionate about being a surgical nurse. When I became a widow, I was able to support my children and myself. Now I enjoy life as a independent mother and grandmother. I love the outdoors, hiking, gardening, knitting, reading, cooking and being with friends.

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: I want to give back - especially to women in my adopted country Peru. I had heard of Kiva but the impetus came in the economic stimulus package and the suggestion from 08Donate.com to use this money to make a difference in the world rather than just buying a new gadget.
lender.occupational_info: In my day job I am a programmer at the University of Arizona. But I consider my life work to help bring more justice and opportunity in the world.

lender.name: Kevin
lender.loan_because: I want to help change the world $25 at a time.
lender.occupational_info: I am an Episcopal priest in the Diocese of Chicago.

lender.name: Brandi
lender.loan_because: I want to be a blessing to other people.

lender.name: Hiroyuki
lender.loan_because: We are all one.
lender.occupational_info: advertising

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: I believe in helping other people. I am very grateful for everything I have because I know that people everywhere everyday struggle to make a living. For some people, they have to struggle to survive. Being a grateful person for everything that I've been blessed with, I believe this isn't just about giving, this is about human life and bringing the world closer together.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: I want to help give people opportunities.
lender.occupational_info: Buying parts for airplanes

lender.name: KIM SHIN
lender.loan_because: A little contribution make great start and improve lives better.

lender.name: Trevor
lender.loan_because: I believe a loan is empowering. Welfare is not.
lender.occupational_info: I am an information technology manager and a part-time soldier. I am also a deist, transhumanist, weapons enthusiast and avid video game player. I build my own computers and I am a photographer. I am trying to teach myself to play guitar and I enjoy writing.

lender.name: Yu Yatani
lender.loan_because: Money is like manure. It only does any good if you spread it around.
lender.occupational_info: Internet and website consultant .

lender.name: Miles
lender.loan_because: I loan because the money will help people in less fortunate Countries
lender.occupational_info: Some day i want to work for a Non Governmental Organization as a professional Fund Raiser

lender.name: Martin
lender.loan_because: I appreciate the idea of helping one person accomplish a goal of improving his or her life.
lender.occupational_info: I am a retired librarian. I worked in a science museum and helped people find the books and information they need in their scientific research.

lender.name: Eileen
lender.loan_because: I like the Kiva philosophy, how small contributions made by many can change a life.

lender.name: Richard
lender.loan_because: Helping those who want to improve themselves is a tremendous opportunity.
lender.occupational_info: My "work" is now mostly as a volunteer in several organizations which I want to support with my time and efforts.

lender.name: Nazim
lender.loan_because: I am miserable of being so materialistic in this superficial existence of mine. If I can imagine a smile on someone's (who lives in such dire circumstances) face for even a fraction of a second, that's a blessing from a poor soul which genuinely touches one's heart.
lender.occupational_info: I service pcs and laptops for a mid size company

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: It's an ideal opportunity to help someone quickly and directly. I can't afford to make a large loan, but I'm glad to be able to help someone for whom $25 is a big help.
lender.occupational_info: I teach piano and clarinet to students of all ages. I try to help them find the joy in playing and give them an appreciation for music whether or not they decide to make a career out of it.

lender.name: Marcelo
lender.loan_because: we can help/trust people.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I am a small business owner and know how hard it is to keep a business running without funding.
lender.occupational_info: I own and manage a custom skincare boutique. I help women with skin sensitivity and skin conditions find products that are effective in the treatment of their skin.

lender.name: Vanessa
lender.loan_because: i want to help others fulfill their dreams to make their lives better.

lender.name: Electa
lender.loan_because: This was a mother's day present from my son

lender.name: Yeshua
lender.loan_because: I can help.
lender.occupational_info: fisher of men

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I am in the International Baccalaureate program at my high school, and one of the things that we do in this program is create a project that benefits someone or the community. My project is to make bracelets & such that I can hand out and collect donations to send (through Kiva) to entrepreneurs in third world countries. I feel that this is the perfect opportunity to make a significant difference in the lives of people that do not have as many opportunities as we do in America.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: It can change the world

lender.name: Melly
lender.loan_because: I am so blessed and hope that I can bless some others around the world. I LOVE the idea of this program - I think it is fabulous!
lender.occupational_info: I design patterns for toys, bags and quilts. These patterns are then wholesaled to craft stores around the world.

lender.name: Shirley
lender.occupational_info: Retired

lender.name: paul
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a sales rep for a women's footwear company.

lender.name: Renee & John
lender.loan_because: Life has been very good to us and we believe in "paying it forward." Every small act of kindness and generosity is a step towards a better and more just world.

lender.name: Cindy
lender.loan_because:
I grew up very poor and know what it is like to struggle just for the basics. Through much generosity from organizations locally, I was able to go back to school and get my current job which pays well enough that we can actually keep food in the house and the heat running.
I loan because it is my way of paying it forward.
lender.occupational_info:
I listen to medical reports dictated by doctors on the patients they see throughout the day and transcribe or type them up on the computer for their records.
I'm also working on being more active in the theatrical and film community. (My photo is from the Bristol Renaissance Faire where I am in my 10th season performing.)
Whenever I can I like to sew quilts and do needlework and to perform in plays with my children.

lender.name: armina
lender.loan_because: I want to help
lender.occupational_info: I try to make computers and people understand each other better

lender.name: Meghan
lender.loan_because: I know how life-changing a helpful hand can be, no matter how small the gesture.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get and stay healthy.

lender.name: faye & cid
lender.loan_because: We'll be very happy if our little help will be valuable to those who want tomorrow to be an improvement on today.

lender.name: Heidi
lender.loan_because: As little as I might have, there are always people struggling to get anywhere near my quality of life. It's humbling.
lender.occupational_info: I clean houses for others who are too busy with families or work to do so themselves.

lender.name: YUYU
lender.loan_because: I like the idea that the money is actually doing some good, while the same money would not.

lender.name: Lesley
lender.loan_because: I have a wonderful life, full of love and giving. This should be passed on to those not so fortunate.
lender.occupational_info: I assist people to achieve their life goals.

lender.name: Lainey
lender.occupation: Office Manager for a construction company
